basics.name: Conner Hawkins
basics.label: BYU CS Major
basics.summary: Driven CS major with a strong coding foundation and proven work ethic. Adaptable across technical and customer-facing roles, I excel at solving complex problems and managing large tasks. I bring innovation, leadership, and collaboration to every team.

work.summary: Leading frontend architecture, mentoring engineers, and improving performance across core products.
Built features and components, collaborated with design, and shipped cross-browser performant pages.

projects.name: Conner Hawkins Personal Website
